Package project.restaurant.controllers

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
project.restaurant.controllers.LoginController
@Controller public class LoginController extends Object
This class will allow a user/waiter to log-in given they have already signed up.
Author:
James Faraz Pete Pengyuan

  • Method Details

    • getLogin

      @GetMapping("/login") public String getLogin()
      This method will allow a user/waiter to login.
      Returns:
      "login" The webpage to allow a user/waiter to login

    • confirmLogin

      @PostMapping("/confirmLogin") public String confirmLogin(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session, @RequestParam("username") String userName, @RequestParam("password") String password)
      This method will either confirm or deny an attempt at logging in based on their details given compared to their details on the system.
      Parameters:
      session - A method to identify a user, a kitchenstaff or a waiter across more than one page
      userName - The username for the user/waiter
      password - The password for the user/waiter
      Returns:
      "loginFailed" The webpage denying a user access if their details are incorrect

    • logout

      @PostMapping("/logout") public String logout(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      This method logs out the user/waiter.
      Parameters:
      session - A method to identify a user, a kitchenstaff or a waiter across more than one page
      Returns:
      "home" The homepage

    • kitchenStaffHome

      @GetMapping("/kitchenStaffHome") public String kitchenStaffHome(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      This method will allow the kitchen staff to access the kitchen staff's homepage if they have access otherwise it will refer the user to the default homepage.
      Parameters:
      session - A method to identify a user, a kitchenstaff or a waiter across more than one page
      Returns:
      "home" The default homepage "waiterhome" The waiter's homepage

    • waiterhome

      @GetMapping("/waiterhome") public String waiterhome(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      This method will allow the waiter to access the waiter's homepage if they have access otherwise direct a normal user to the default homepage.
      Parameters:
      session - A method to identify a user, a kitchenstaff or a waiter across more than one page
      Returns:
      "home" The default homepage "waiterhome" The waiter's homepage
